xxl.core.util.timers
Class JNITimer

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.util.timers.JNITimer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Timer
public class JNITimer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Timer

This is a timer which uses a native library to implement the Timer interface. The precision is usually very good. The library has to be inside the path.

Field Summary
protected  long starttime
          The last starting time of this timer.
 
Constructor Summary
JNITimer()
          Constructs a new timer that is implemented in the platform dependant library "JNITimer".
 
Method Summary
 long getDuration()
          Returns time in ms since JNITimer was started.
 long getTicksPerSecond()
          Returns number of ticks per second
 void start()
          Starts a JNITimer.
 java.lang.String timerInfo()
          Returns string "Native Timer"

Field Detail

starttime

protected long starttime
The last starting time of this timer.

Constructor Detail

JNITimer

public JNITimer()
Constructs a new timer that is implemented in the platform dependant library "JNITimer". This code only works when the appropriate JNI-library is availlable for your platform. JNI-Code is implemented in the supplemental package connectivity.jni.
